keys.app.unpublished: You have unpublished changes. Leave without publishing?
keys.seasonal.title: Seasonal Promotions
keys.seasonal.subtitle: Participating in seasonal promos pays off. Diners are twice as likely to book reservations for holidays, so be sure to highlight any special menus, pre fixe deals, hours, events and offers.
keys.seasonal.joined.subtitle: Your Promos
keys.seasonal.unjoined.subtitle: Add Promos
keys.featured.title: Featured Lists
keys.featured.subtitle: Promoting your special menus, restaurant features, dietary accommodations and offers gives people more incentive to dine with you! From brunch menus to gluten-free dishes, go ahead and flaunt your features.
keys.featured.joined.subtitle: Your Lists
keys.featured.unjoined.subtitle: Add Lists
keys.leadgen.form.description: Tell us how to get in touch and we'll reach out within 48 hours.
keys.leadgen.submitted.title: Thank You!
keys.leadgen.submitted.simpleMessage: A member of the restaurant team will reach out within 48 hours.
keys.leadgen.submitted.message: We'll be in touch soon. In the meantime you can learn more about the Private Dining feature {here}.
keys.privatedining.title: Private Dining
keys.privatedining.leadgen.heading: Take your private dining room public
keys.privatedining.leadgen.body: Capture more qualified leads for group events and parties year-round. Get listed in our private dining directory to promote your space on our network, in emails to diners and in Google searches, so you get the best exposure.
keys.privatedining.leadgen.button.label: I'm interested
keys.privatedining.enabled.heading: You have signed up for Private Dining
keys.privatedining.enabled.body: To make any changes to your profile please contact support at
keys.privatedining.enabled.body.email.message: I have a question about my Private Dining service. Please contact me as soon as possible.
keys.privatedining.form.publish.success: Thanks! We've received your profile. We'll let you know when it's live within 48 hours.
keys.privatedining.form.publish.error.modal.m: Your private dining profile could not be published. Please try again.
keys.privatedining.enabled.v2.section.info.li: This will appear on your restaurant's opentable.com profile page and your private dining profile.
keys.privatedining.enabled.v2.section.contact: Let the public know who to contact for more info about private dining.
keys.privatedining.enabled.v2.section.rooms.d: List up to five private dining areas to feature on your private dining profile.
keys.privatedining.enabled.v2.fields.name: Name
keys.privatedining.enabled.v2.photo.modal.ins: Drag and drop your photo or
keys.privatedining.enabled.v2.photo.modal.sta: Use JPEG or PNG, 512 x 512 pixels min, 10MB max.
keys.privatedining.enabled.v2.photo.modal.err: The photo dimensions are too small. Please use 512 x 512 pixels min.
We don't recognize that file format. Please upload a JPEG or PNG file.
keys.guestcampaigns.title: Promoted Results
keys.guestcampaigns.heading: Attract diners with promoted results
keys.guestcampaigns.marketingsolutions.descri: Promoted Results helps your restaurant grow.
keys.guestcampaigns.promotedinventory.descrip: Bump your restaurant listing to the top of the search results.
This special will be discarded. To keep working on this special, select Stay.
Please select at least one day.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.type.title: Type
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.type.descri: Choose the type of special you want to run.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.title.title: Title
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.title.descr: Modify this title to make it unique. Guests will see it on OpenTable.
This is what draws people, more than the description.
Use 5 words max (no need to include restaurant name).
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.description: Make this description unique. Guests will see it on your OpenTable restaurant profile.
Enjoy $5 drink specials from our signature beverage list.
Select one of our signature beverages.
Enjoy one of our famous tacos on us.
Note: if you're advertising a special for a specific price, include tax and service.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.startdate.d: We've pre-selected a date one week from today. This gives guests time to book your special.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.enddate.des: Specify an end date for your special. This is optional and you can choose to remove it.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.enddate.inv: Please select an end date that is after your start date.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.daysandtime: Specify the days and times you want to run your special.
We recommend selecting times when you already have a happy hour or special offered.
Do you run happy hour at multiple times?
Do you want to run this special at multiple times?
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.form.blockeddays: Specify the days you don't want to offer specials. By default, we block days that typically attract more guests.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.landingpage.stan: Get more guests when you want them.
Specials showcase an offering of your choice. They're a great way to:
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.landingpage.bull: Running a special results in an average cover lift of 5%.
Empty tables are a loss. Offering a little something special can attract guests.
Attract more diners to shoulder times, slow nights, or any other time.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.landingpage.free: Running a special is free (it's included in your cover fee).
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.completed.headin: You're set! Your special will be published within the next 30 minutes.
keys.guestcampaigns.specials.completed.descri: In the meantime, if you have questions about specials, call support at 1-800-OPENTABLE
keys.guestcampaigns.terms.specials.descriptio: To publish this special, you'll need to agree to these {terms-and-conditions-link} by filling out your name, the legal name of your restaurant, and affirming that you've read and agree to the terms.
keys.guestcampaigns.terms.client_has_read: Client has read, understood and agree to be bound by terms of the {opentable-client-agreement-link}. I hereby represent and warrant that I am of legal age to form a binding contract and have full legal authority to bind Client to this Agreement.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.inactive_message: Attract diners with Promoted Results to help your restaurant grow.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.infobox: Bonus Point Campaigns will be shown here soon. For now, call your OpenTable Representative at {phone-number} to get information about those Campaigns.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.custom_promotions.st: These are custom promotions you're currently running on OpenTable.
These are custom promotions you've run previously.

Paused campaigns aren't bringing diners to your restaurant but will resume at the specified time. Call your OpenTable Representative at {phone-number} if you have any questions or wish to terminate these campaigns.
Pending draft campaigns were created by your OpenTable Representative after your last phone conversation. They need your approval to activate.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.specials.state_descr: These Specials are active on OpenTable and bringing more diners to your restaurant.
These are Specials you ran in the past.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.state_description_ac: These campaigns are active on OpenTable and bringing more diners to your restaurant.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.state_description_in: These are campaigns that you have run in the past. They are not active anymore and do not bring diners to your restaurant.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.state_description_pa: Paused campaigns aren't bringing diners to your restaurant but will resume at the specified time. Call your OpenTable Representative at {phone-number} if you have any questions or wish to terminate these campaigns.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.state_description_pe: Pending draft campaigns were created by your OpenTable Representative after your last phone conversation. They need your approval to activate.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.incentive.title: Title
keys.guestcampaigns.list.pause.description.1: Pausing this campaign will stop it from promoting your restaurant for {formatted-duration}. After 48 hours, it will resume promoting your restaurant.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.pause.description.2: If there is a problem and you need to modify or end this campaign, pause it and call your representative at {phone-number}.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.pause.confirmed.1: Your campaign is paused for the next 48 hours. It will resume on {date} at {time}.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.pause.confirmed.2: Call your representative as soon as possible at {phone-number} if you need to modify or end this campaign.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.specials.end.descrip: If you end this specials campaign, guests will no longer be able to book {special-title} specials.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.end.description.1: If you end this short-term campaign, you will no longer be boosted in search results on this shift.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.end.description.2: Covers that are already booked through this campaign will still appear on your bill. Are you sure you want to continue?
keys.guestcampaigns.list.change.description: What do you need to change about this draft campaign?
keys.guestcampaigns.list.change.placeholder: Write a short summary of what needs to be changed
keys.guestcampaigns.list.change.confirmed.1: This change request has been filed in our system.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.change.confirmed.2: The current draft campaign will be discarded and a new one will be sent to you as soon as possible.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.blockdays.confirm.re: Removing this {label} block will remove it for future years
keys.guestcampaigns.list.blockdays.confirm.ad: Do you want to block the campaign from promoting {label} every year, or just {intlDate}?
keys.guestcampaigns.list.discard.description: If you discard this campaign, you will need to get in touch with your representative again if you want to draft a new campaign.
keys.guestcampaigns.list.discard.placeholder: Tell us why you are discarding this campaign (optional)
keys.guestcampaigns.custompromotions.landingp: You haven't created any Custom Promotions. Learn more about how Custom Promotions can get more guests to book at your restaurant by calling your OpenTable Representative at 1-800-673-6822.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.1: Do you offer a special Thanksgiving menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.4: Do you offer a special New Yearâ€™s Eve menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.5: Do you offer a special Christmas menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.6: Do you offer a special Christmas menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.description.14: When the weather is warmâ€”or not and you have heat lamps!â€”your restaurantâ€™s patio, terrace, or other outdoor space is a destination for dining outside.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.14: Tell us why your outdoor dining options attract diners.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.77: Do you offer a special Motherâ€™s Day menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.85: Do you offer a special Fatherâ€™s Day menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.102: Do you offer a special Valentineâ€™s Day menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.description.212: Eggs, pancakes, duck confit hash, you name itâ€”guests will love weekend mornings at your restaurant.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.212: Tell us why your brunch menu rocks.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.228: Do you offer a special Easter menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.description.243: From speedy service to proximity to cultural centers, your restaurant is an ideal spot for theatre-goers and other diners where dining is not the main event.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.243: Tell us why your restaurant is a great choice for theatre-goers.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.355: Does your restaurant do anything special for Cinco de Mayo? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.promo.description.369: From craft cocktails to bustling happy hours and extensive wine lists, your restaurant sets a high bar for those who love a great drink.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.369: Tell us why people who love craft cocktails will flock to your bar.
keys.promos.promo.description.370: Offer free corkage? Donâ€™t have a liquor license? Spread the news that guests can bring their own bottles to enjoy at your restaurant.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.370: Tell us why your BYOB status will enhance any meal.
keys.promos.promo.description.371: Business lunches, dinners, and entertaining work groups are your specialty, especially if your restaurant is located in a business district.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.371: Tell us why you attract business diners.
keys.promos.promo.description.630: Got gluten-free pasta or alternative grains? If your menu contains a number of dishes that are specifically tailored to wheat- and gluten-free dining, let customers know.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.630: Tell us why your gluten-free menu is the best thing around town.
keys.promos.promo.description.631: Does your menu contain a number of dishes that would satisfy a hungry vegetarian or vegan?
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.631: Tell us why your plant-forward menu will satisfy diners who donâ€™t eat meat.
keys.promos.promo.placeholder.728: Do you offer a special Hanukkah menu? Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this holiday.
keys.promos.form.placeholder: Tell us why your restaurant is the place to book for this promotion.
